testcase.name: RapidOCR extracts text from an image and produces empty output for a blank image

failure.message: RapidOCR extractor requires an optional dependency. Install it with pip install "biblicus[ocr]".

testcase.failure: Failing step: And I build a "ocr-rapidocr" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... failed in 0.005s Location: features/integration_ocr_image_extraction.feature:9 ASSERT FAILED: RapidOCR extractor requires an optional dependency. Install it with pip install "biblicus[ocr]".
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: RapidOCR extracts text from an image and produces empty output for a blank image When I download an image corpus into "corpus" ... passed in 2.744s And I build a "ocr-rapidocr" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... failed in 0.005s Then the extracted text for the item tagged "image-with-text" is not empty in the latest extraction run ... skipped in 0.000s And the extracted text for the item tagged "image-without-text" is empty in the latest extraction run ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
